class="nom_auteur">DiSanti</span>, N. <span class="nom_auteur">Dello Russo</span> et K. <span class="nom_auteur">Magee-Sauer</span>, <span lang="en">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">Remote infrared observations of parent volatiles in comets: A window on the early solar system</cite> »</span>, <i><span class="lang-en" lang="en">Advances in Space Research</span></i>, <abbr class="abbr" title="volume">vol.</abbr> 31, <abbr class="abbr" title="numéro">n<sup>o</sup></abbr> 12,‎ <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2003-06" datetime="2003-06">juin 2003</time>, <abbr class="abbr" title="pages">p.</abbr> 2563–2575 <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/Digital_Object_Identifier" title="Digital Object Identifier">DOI</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://dx.doi.org/10.1016/S0273-1177%2803%2900578-7" rel="nofollow">10.1016/S0273-1177(03)00578-7</a></span>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Remote+infrared+observations+of+parent+volatiles+in+comets%3A+A+window+on+the+early+solar+system&amp;rft.jtitle=Advances+in+Space+Research&amp;rft.issue=12&amp;rft.aulast=Mumma&amp;rft.aufirst=M.J.&amp;rft.au=DiSanti%2C+M.A.&amp;rft.au=Dello+Russo%2C+N.&amp;rft.au=Magee-Sauer%2C+K.&amp;rft.date=2003-06&amp;rft.volume=31&amp;rft.pages=2563%E2%80%932575&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2FS0273-1177%2803%2900578-7&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-sun_future_schroder-70"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-sun_future_schroder_70-0">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" <li id="cite_note-150"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-150">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="BrožVokrouhlický2008"><span class="ouvrage" Williams, <a class="external text" href="https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/planetary/factsheet/uranusfact.html" rel="nofollow">« <cite style="font-style:normal;"><span class="lang-en" lang="en"><i>Uranus Fact Sheet</i></span></cite> »</a>, <span class="lang-en" lang="en">NASA, National Space Science Data Center</span>, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2020-11" datetime="2020-11">novembre 2020</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(consulté le <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2021-02-17" datetime="2021-02-17">17 février 2021</time>)</small></span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-180"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-180">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <span lang="en"><a class="external text" href="https://solarsystem.nasa.gov/planets/uranus/in-depth/" rel="nofollow">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">Uranus</cite> »</a></span>, <span class="italique"><span class="lang-en" lang="en">In Depth</span></span>, sur <span class="italique">NASA Solar System Exploration</span> <small style="line-height:1em;">(consulté le <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2021-06-05" datetime="2021-06-05">5 juin 2021</time>)</small></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-203"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-203">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="NamouniMorais2018"><span class="ouvrage" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=An+interstellar+origin+for+Jupiter%27s+retrograde+co-orbital+asteroid&amp;rft.jtitle=Monthly+Notices+of+the+Royal+Astronomical+Society%3A+Letters&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.aulast=Namouni&amp;rft.aufirst=Fathi&amp;rft.au=Morais%2C+Maria+Helena+Moreira&amp;rft.date=2018-06-11&amp;rft.volume=477&amp;rft.pages=L117%E2%80%93L121&amp;rft.issn=1745-3925&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Fmnrasl%2Fsly057&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-220"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-220">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="YoshidaNakamura2005"><span class="ouvrage" id="F._YoshidaT._Nakamura2005"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> F. <span class="nom_auteur">Yoshida</span> et T. <span class="nom_auteur">Nakamura</span>, <span lang="en">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">Size Distribution of Faint Jovian L4 Trojan Asteroids*</cite> »</span>, <i><span class="lang-en" lang="en">The Astronomical Journal</span></i>, <abbr class="abbr" title="volume">vol.</abbr> 130, <abbr class="abbr" title="numéro">n<sup>o</sup></abbr> 6,‎ <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2005-12-01" datetime="2005-12-01"><abbr class="abbr" title="premier">1<sup>er</sup></abbr> décembre 2005</time>, <abbr class="abbr" title="page">p.</abbr> 2900 <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Serial_Number" title="International Standard Serial Number">ISSN</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive"><a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/issn/1538-3881&amp;lang=fr" rel="nofollow">1538-3881</a></span>, <a href="/wiki/Digital_Object_Identifier" title="Digital Object Identifier">DOI</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://dx.doi.org/10.1086/497571" rel="nofollow">10.1086/497571</a></span>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Size+Distribution+of+Faint+Jovian+L4+Trojan+Asteroids%2A&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Astronomical+Journal&amp;rft.issue=6&amp;rft.aulast=Yoshida&amp;rft.aufirst=F.&amp;rft.au=Nakamura%2C+T.&amp;rft.date=2005-12-01&amp;rft.volume=130&amp;rft.pages=2900&amp;rft.issn=1538-3881&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1086%2F497571&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-234"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-234">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Slíz-BaloghBartaHorváth2019"><span class="ouvrage" id="Judit_Slíz-BaloghAndrás_BartaGábor_Horváth2019"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Judit <span class="nom_auteur">Slíz-Balogh</span>, András <span class="nom_auteur">Barta</span> et Gábor <span class="nom_auteur">Horváth</span>, <span lang="en">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">Celestial Mechanics and Polarization Optics of the Kordylewski Dust Cloud in the Earth-Moon Lagrange Point L5 Part II. <li id="cite_note-257"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-257">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="DelsantiJewitt2006"><span class="ouvrage" id="Audrey_DelsantiDavid_Jewitt2006"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Audrey <span class="nom_auteur">Delsanti</span> et David <span class="nom_auteur">Jewitt</span>, <cite lang="en" style="font-style:normal">« The Solar System Beyond The Planets »</cite>, dans Philippe BlondelJohn W. <li id="cite_note-322"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-322">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="BouvierWadhwa2010"><span class="ouvrage" <li id="cite_note-Crida2009-350"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-Crida2009_350-0">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Crida2009"><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.btitle=Reviews+in+Modern+Astronomy&amp;rft.atitle=Solar+System+formation&amp;rft.aulast=Crida&amp;rft.aufirst=Aur%C3%A9lien&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft.volume=21&amp;rft.pages=3008&amp;rft.isbn=978-3-527-62919-0&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1002%2F9783527629190.ch12&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Desch07-351"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-Desch07_351-0">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Desch2007"><span class="ouvrage" id="S.J._Desch2007"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> S.J. <li id="cite_note-385"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-385">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Weinert2009"><span class="ouvrage" id="Friedel_Weinert2009"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Friedel <span class="nom_auteur">Weinert</span>, <cite class="italique" lang="en">Copernicus, Darwin, &amp; Freud: revolutions in the history and philosophy of science</cite>, <a href="/wiki/Wiley-Blackwell" title="Wiley-Blackwell">Wiley-Blackwell</a>, <time>2009</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Sp%C3%A9cial:Ouvrages_de_r%C3%A9f%C3%A9rence/978-1-4051-8183-9" title="Spécial:Ouvrages de référence/978-1-4051-8183-9"><span class="nowrap">978-1-4051-8183-9</span></a>, <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/copernicusdarwin00wein" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a>)</small>, <abbr class="abbr" title="page">p.</abbr> 21<span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Copernicus%2C+Darwin%2C+%26+Freud%3A+revolutions+in+the+history+and+philosophy+of+science&amp;rft.pub=Wiley-Blackwell&amp;rft.aulast=Weinert&amp;rft.aufirst=Friedel&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft.pages=21&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4051-8183-9&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</span>

</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-446"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-446">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a class="external text" href="https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/spacecraft/display.action?id=1965-092A" rel="nofollow">Fiche</a> de <i><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/Venera_3" title="Venera 3">Venera 3</a></span></i> sur le site de la <i><a href="/wiki/NASA_Space_Science_Data_Coordinated_Archive" title="NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive">NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive</a></i>.

</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-447"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-447">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a class="external text" href="https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/spacecraft/display.action?id=1971-049A" rel="nofollow">Fiche</a> de <i><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/Mars_3" title="Mars 3">Mars 3</a></span></i> sur le site de la <i><a href="/wiki/NASA_Space_Science_Data_Coordinated_Archive" title="NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive">NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive</a></i>.

</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-448"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-448">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a class="external text" href="https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/spacecraft/display.action?id=1975-075C" rel="nofollow">Fiche</a> de <i><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/Viking_1" title="Viking 1">Viking 1</a></span></i> sur le site de la <i><a href="/wiki/NASA_Space_Science_Data_Coordinated_Archive" title="NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive">NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive</a></i>.

</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-449"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-449">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a class="external text" href="https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/spacecraft/display.action?id=1997-061C" rel="nofollow">Fiche</a> de <i><a href="/wiki/Huygens_(sonde_spatiale)" title="Huygens (sonde spatiale)">Huygens</a></i> sur le site de la <i><a href="/wiki/NASA_Space_Science_Data_Coordinated_Archive" title="NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive">NASA Space Science Data Coordinated Archive</a></i>.

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bibliographie_anglophone">Bibliographie anglophone</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a class="mw-editsection-visualeditor" href="/w/index.php?title=Syst%C3%A8me_solaire&amp;veaction=edit&amp;section=61" title="Modifier la section : Bibliographie anglophone">modifier</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Syst%C3%A8me_solaire&amp;action=edit&amp;section=61" title="Modifier la section : Bibliographie anglophone">modifier le code</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="colonnes" style="column-width:30em;column-gap:1em;">
<ul><li><span class="ouvrage" id="McFaddenWeissmanJohnson2007"><span class="ouvrage" id="Lucy-Ann_Adams_McFaddenPaul_Robert_WeissmanT._V._Johnson2007"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Lucy-Ann Adams <span class="nom_auteur">McFadden</span>, Paul Robert <span class="nom_auteur">Weissman</span> et T. V. <span class="nom_auteur">Johnson</span>, <cite class="italique" lang="en">Encyclopedia of the Solar System</cite>, Academic Press, <time>2007</time>, <abbr class="abbr" title="deuxième">2<sup>e</sup></abbr> <abbr class="abbr" title="édition">éd.</abbr>, 992 <abbr class="abbr" title="pages">p.</abbr> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Sp%C3%A9cial:Ouvrages_de_r%C3%A9f%C3%A9rence/978-0-08-047498-4" <li><span class="ouvrage" id="NeumannCarlin2016"><span class="ouvrage" id="Chas_NeumannAlejandro_Carlin2016"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Chas Neumann et Alejandro Carlin, <cite class="italique" lang="en">Minor Planets &amp; Trans-Neptunian Objects (Important Astronomical Objects)</cite>, New York, College Publishing House, <time>2016</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Sp%C3%A9cial:Ouvrages_de_r%C3%A9f%C3%A9rence/978-1-280-13717-4" title="Spécial:Ouvrages de référence/978-1-280-13717-4"><span class="nowrap">978-1-280-13717-4</span></a>, <a class="external text" href="http://psulibrary.palawan.edu.ph/wtbooks/resources/pdf/9781280137174.pdf" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a> <abbr class="abbr indicateur-format format-pdf" title="Document au format Portable Document Format (PDF) d'Adobe">[PDF]</abbr>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Minor+Planets+%26+Trans-Neptunian+Objects+%28Important+Astronomical+Objects%29&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pub=College+Publishing+House&amp;rft.aulast=Neumann&amp;rft.aufirst=Chas&amp;rft.au=Alejandro+Carlin&amp;rft.date=2016&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-280-13717-4&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3ASyst%C3%A8me+solaire"></span></span></span>.</li>

<li><span class="liste-horizontale noarchive"><span class="wd_identifiers">Ressource relative à la santé<span class="noprint wikidata-linkback"><a href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q544?uselang=fr#identifiers" title="Voir et modifier les données sur Wikidata"><img alt="Voir et modifier les données sur Wikidata" class="noviewer" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="600" decoding="async" height="10" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/73/Blue_pencil.svg/10px-Blue_pencil.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/73/Blue_pencil.svg/15px-Blue_pencil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/73/Blue_pencil.svg/20px-Blue_pencil.svg.png 2x" style="vertical-align: baseline" width="10"/></a></span></span> : <ul><li><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a class="external text" href="https://meshb.nlm.nih.gov/record/ui?ui=D016082" rel="nofollow"><span class="lang-en" lang="en">Medical Subject Headings</span></a></li> </ul></span></li>
<li><abbr class="abbr indicateur-format format-vidéo" title="Vidéo au format mpg, avi...">[vidéo]</abbr> <a href="/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Brahic" title="André Brahic">André Brahic</a>, <a class="external text" href="http://www.canal-u.tv/index.php/canalu/producteurs/universite_de_tous_les_savoirs/dossier_programmes/les_conferences_de_l_annee_2000/le_systeme_solaire/le_systeme_solaire/" rel="nofollow">« Le Système solaire »</a>, vidéo-conférence, sur <a href="/wiki/Canal-U" title="Canal-U">Canal-U</a>, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2000-07-07" datetime="2000-07-07">7 juillet 2000</time>.</li>

Merci de prévisualiser avant de sauvegarder.">m</abbr></a></div></div><div style="font-size:110%"><a href="/wiki/Situation_de_la_Terre_dans_l%27Univers" title="Situation de la Terre dans l'Univers">Situation de la Terre dans l'Univers</a></div></th>
</tr> <tr>

<ul class="bandeau-portail" id="bandeau-portail"><li><span class="bandeau-portail-element"><span class="bandeau-portail-icone"><a href="/wiki/Portail:Astronomie" title="Portail de l’astronomie"><img alt="icône décorative" class="noviewer" data-file-height="730" data-file-width="755" decoding="async" height="24" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/27/Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg/25px-Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/27/Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg/37px-Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/27/Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg/50px-Noun_Astronomy_Icon2.svg.png 2x" width="25"/></a></span> <span class="bandeau-portail-texte"><a href="/wiki/Portail:Astronomie" title="Portail:Astronomie">Portail de l’astronomie</a></span> </span></li> <li><span class="bandeau-portail-element"><span class="bandeau-portail-icone"><a href="/wiki/Portail:Syst%C3%A8me_solaire" title="Portail du système solaire"><img alt="icône décorative" class="noviewer" data-file-height="512" data-file-width="512" decoding="async" height="24" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/97/12_Sunsistemo.svg/24px-12_Sunsistemo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/97/12_Sunsistemo.svg/36px-12_Sunsistemo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/97/12_Sunsistemo.svg/48px-12_Sunsistemo.svg.png 2x" width="24"/></a></span> <span class="bandeau-portail-texte"><a href="/wiki/Portail:Syst%C3%A8me_solaire" title="Portail:Système solaire">Portail du système solaire</a></span> </span></li> </ul>
<div class="bandeau-container bandeau-simple bandeau-niveau-neutre plainlinks" id="article_de_qualite" style="background-color:#FFFBFB;"><div class="bandeau-centrer"><div class="bandeau-cell bandeau-icone-css grosse-icone etoile-or" style="display:table-cell;padding-right:0.5em">
<div class="noprint">Cet article est reconnu comme « <a href="/wiki/Wikip%C3%A9dia:Contenus_de_qualit%C3%A9" title="Wikipédia:Contenus de qualité">article de qualité</a> » depuis sa <a class="external text" href="https://fr.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Syst%C3%A8me_solaire&amp;oldid=184632610">version du 27 juillet 2021</a><small> (<a class="external text" href="https://fr.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Syst%C3%A8me_solaire&amp;oldid=184632610&amp;diff=cur">comparer avec la version actuelle</a>)</small>. <br/>Pour toute information complémentaire, consulter sa page de discussion et le <a href="/wiki/Discussion:Syst%C3%A8me_solaire/Article_de_qualit%C3%A9" title="Discussion:Système solaire/Article de qualité">vote l'ayant promu</a>.</div><div class="printcssonly">La version du 27 juillet 2021 de cet article a été reconnue comme « <b>article de qualité</b> », c'est-à-dire qu'elle répond à des critères de qualité concernant le style, la clarté, la pertinence, la citation des sources et l'illustration.</div>
</div></div></div>
